warnings: [WARN] No LinkedIn URL found. Adding it increases recruiter engagement.
[WARN] Too many bullet points. Focus on 10-15 strongest achievements.
[WARN] Few action verbs detected. Start bullets with strong action verbs.
[WARN] Limited quantified achievements. Add numbers/percentages to demonstrate impact.
suggestions: [TIP] Add more industry keywords. Missing: python, javascript, java, sql, api
[TIP] Vary your action verbs. Try: achieved, improved, trained, managed
[TIP] Improve bullet quality: Start with action verbs, include metrics, keep 50-150 chars.
[TIP] More bullets should start with action verbs. Revise passive statements.
[TIP] Expand your resume with more specific achievements and responsibilities.
[TIP] For Swedish CVs: Consider adding a personal letter (personligt brev) as a complement.
